name: apexcura-icons
author: Apex Cura <hello@apexcura.com>
description: Apexcura Icons is a versatile icon library built for seamless integration into modern web applications. It uses a class-based system to provide a collection of scalable, customizable icons that enhance the UI design. With support for dynamic styles and easy customization, Apexcura Icons ensures flexibility and ease of use.
